name: 3 Heroes Quest
description:
Join a group of three heroes on a journey to stop villain Fade and his army of minions from annihilating all life on the planet. Use the unique skills of each character, switching between them during each stage to face different challenges like platforms, enemies and bosses.

Embark on this nostalgic adventure, with many references to 80s and 90s classics, pixel art visuals, 8bit music and sound effects, embedded in fun and challenging mechanics.
